1101 000000000001  ; IN num1
1101 000000000010  ; IN num2
1101 000000000011  ; IN num3
0000 000000000001  ; LOAD num1
0011 000000000010  ; ADD num2
0011 000000000011  ; ADD num3
0001 000000000100  ; STORE sum
1110 000000000100  ; OUT sum
1111 000000000000  ; HALT
000000000000        ; num1 memory cell
000000000000        ; num2 memory cell
000000000000        ; num3 memory cell
000000000000        ; sum memory cell
